doc:
Adrian Paul https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Adrian_Paul 0 Adrian Paul (born Adrian Paul Hewett; 29 May 1959) is an English actor known for his titular role on the television series Highlander: The Series as Duncan MacLeod. In 1997, he founded the Peace Fund charitable organisation. Adrian_Paul ( born Adrian_Paul_Hewett ; 29_May_1959 ) is an_English_actor known for his_titular_role on the_television_series_Highlander : The_Series as Duncan_MacLeod . In 1997 , he founded the_Peace_Fund_charitable_organisation .
